name: Azalea King (Vers. 2.5)
description:
This is the first large-scale project I've made and hopefully, it comes out ok. Right now it is in VERY early stages. I plan to add a diverse (non-linear) map for the campaign mode, over 30 bosses, close to 80 levels, and most likely update the graphics.

This version of the game, Azalea King, has only been in the works for about a week and it's probably only taken me a total of 20 hours to whip up, however, it comes from a concept for a game that was originally spawned all the way back near the end of 2020 called Blocks & Shapes. You may have seen it, and you'll notice the gameplay is extremely similar. However, that idea somehow morphed into whatever this is, so the Blocks & Shapes saga has ended. RIP.
